identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a financial dashboard that feels like a Bloomberg Terminal redesigned by a Swiss minimalist. Precision, speed, and zero fluff.
principles: Data is the Art: The numbers are the hero. Everything else is support.
Darkness is Canvas: Use deep obsidian backgrounds to make colored data pop.
Monospace for Money: All financial data must use tabular lining figures (JetBrains Mono).
Density over Whitespace: In trading, seeing more rows matters. Use compact density.
Alerts are Signal: Alerts must cut through the noise with high-contrast visibility.

headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Modal titles

mono.usage: Stock prices, Strike prices, P&L, Greeks, Expiry dates

rules: Use tabular-nums class for all dynamic data to prevent jitter.

usage_rules: NEVER use gradients for backgrounds. Flat, matte colors only.
Use 'dim' colors for backgrounds of badges/chips (e.g., bg-green-500/10 text-green-500).
Call Options = Green/Neutral. Put Options = Red/Neutral (or context dependent).

structure: Top Bar: Global Portfolio Stats (Net Liq, Daily P&L) - Fixed height.

Button.secondary: bg-zinc-800 text-white hover:bg-zinc-700 border border-zinc-700 rounded-md

visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Use a subtle glowing border effect on the 'Add Trade' modal to draw attention.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-md bg-black/50 for the sticky top navigation bar.
visual_enhancers.alert_indicators: Use a progress bar or 'distance meter' in the table row to show how close price is to strike. Color code it: Green (>10%), Yellow (5-10%), Red (<5%).

images.description: Subtle dark financial data texture for login page background or empty states.

media.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Use 'TrendingUp', 'TrendingDown', 'AlertTriangle', 'DollarSign'.

instructions_to_main_agent.step_1: Setup Tailwind theme with the specific Zinc colors defined in 'colors'.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Create the 'Trade' type definition (Ticker, Strike, Expiry, Type, Premium, Current Price).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Build the 'Dashboard' layout using the Bento Grid strategy.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Implement the 'Active Trades' table with high density. Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all numbers.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: Create the 'Add Trade' dialog using Shadcn Dialog + Form.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_6: Implement the Alert Logic: Calculate % difference between Current Price and Strike. If Put & <5%, show Warning. If Call & <1%, show Warning.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Use grids.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for overlays.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable in the layout containers, but keep data tables dense.
Subtle grain textures or noise overlays can separate good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
